questions.content: How to create reusable component in Ember 2.10?
questions.notes: I have a web application with couple pages, each uses Ember app with different components for different logic. But I came up to 1 component is going to be absolutely same for all those pages. I would like to make that component reusable. How to do that in scope of my web application?

questions.author: John L
questions.content: Why do Actions functions not have access to the component?
questions.notes: The clickButton action has no access to the transitionToRoute function because it can't see the component. It only sees this as what is declared in the contents of this file or what is implicitly added in other ways. Why can't actions allowed to see the component? I've never understood this!
